page.title: 19KASKENMOOR COMPREHENSIVE
page.content: {Kaskenmoor Comprehensive School,}on the Northern edge of the survey block has seen several changes in recent years. The school has maintained its intake despite falling rolls and will shortly become one of the first {community schools}in the Oldham area. It is hoped that new facilities such as a sports hall and swimming pool can be provided.{A special needs {department}caters for{handicapped}and ethnic minority children within the school.The School will host a{COMPUTER {CAMP}in August when 35 BBC model "B's" will be available to the local area, along with{MOUSE, LOGO, PRESTEL}etc. The survey block is used extensively for fieldwork - housing, shopping, traffic, land-use surveys and river studies.The{M66}will pass very close to the school,noise from the traffic being a possible problem.
